replies.msg:
大家好 我地係3個今年grad既大學生 諗住6月22至7月4日去西藏到周圍玩10至12日
希望搵多2至3人年紀差唔多既一齊夾車 問過師傅 1400Rmb一日
有意既請留Tg 詳情可以係tg慢慢講

行程如下（可以再傾傾)
D1: 拉薩、思金拉措（財神湖、巴松措，住湖邊
D2: 巴松措、林芝、鲁朗林海、住林芝八一
D3: 八一、雅鲁藏布江大峽谷、米林縣、卧龍奇石、朗縣
D4: 朗縣、達古峽谷，加查縣、澤當/桑耶寺
D5: 澤當、羊湖、普姆雍措、卡若拉冰川、江孜
D6: 江孜、白居寺十萬佛塔、扎什倫布寺、日喀則
D7: 日喀則，珠峰大本營
D8: 珠峰，日喀則
D9:日喀則、尼木、羊八井、納木措
D10: 納木措、拉薩
輕輕一推
上大陸網同人併啦
主要想搵返香港人，巴打有冇咩網推介？

quote.msg: 主要想搵返香港人，巴打有冇咩網推介？

replies.msg: 試下去螞蜂窩睇下,

quote.msg: 主要想搵返香港人，巴打有冇咩網推介？

replies.msg: 唔該巴打
順便問下，13/7-4/8去，暫時四個人（有兩個20號先join)，行程未定，有意可留tg
推一推

你接唔接受到同大陸人一齊玩？
有個群組可以拉你入去搵人拼車

quote.msg:
你接唔接受到同大陸人一齊玩？
有個群組可以拉你入去搵人拼車

replies.msg:
想搵香港人 所以唔使了
Btw 唔該巴打先
唔玩多幾日？10日多啲唔夠去

quote.msg: 唔玩多幾日？10日多啲唔夠去

replies.msg: 我地買咗機票，巴打有冇咩推介一定要去？

quote.msg: 順便問下，13/7-4/8去，暫時四個人（有兩個20號先join)，行程未定，有意可留tg

replies.msg: I've been to many countries. I had always thought that other countries were better than hong kong but after I went on holiday in these countries I realised that in terms of city life, nightlife, shopping and food, Hong Kong really is the best. In Europe shops close at four on weekdays and don't open at all at weekends except big cities like London where shops close at six on weekdays and four at weekends. Their main sorts of entertainment are pubs and clubs. Las Vegas has spectacular night views but it was primarily built for tourism. It's famous for gambling, unique hotel design and shows like boxing events. However in terms of scenery Tibet and Scandinavia are the most ravishing. Tibet is famous for its breathtaking scenery at high altitude. Xinjiang is also a place of outstanding scenic beauty. If you think you might have altitude sickness such as dizziness, headaches and trouble sleeping I heartily recommend taking some medicine along just in case. In fact my friend who's just been to the Mount Everest base camp showed me his photos taken there by which I was awestruck. Tibet is definitely a glamorous holiday destination. A tour of the base camp would be a once in a lifetime experience.

I've been on holiday in many countries. I had always thought that many other countries were better than Hong Kong but after I went on holiday in these countries, I realised that in terms of city life, nightlife, food and shopping, Hong Kong really is the best. In Europe, shops close at four on weekdays amd don't open at all at weekends except big cities like London where shops close at six on weekdays and four at weekends. Their main sorts of entertainment are pubs and clubs. Las Vegas has spectacular night views but it was primarily built for tourism. It's famous for gambling, unique hotel design and shows like boxing events. However, in terms of scenery, Scandinavia and Tibet are the most ravishing I would say. Tibet is famous for its breathtaking scenery at high altitude. Xinjiang is also a place of outstanding scenic beauty. If you think you might have altitude sickness, I suggest that you bring some medicine along. In fact, my friend who's been to the Mount Everest base camp showed me his photos taken there by which I was awestruck. It's definitely a glamorous holiday destination. A tour of the Mount Everest base camp would be a once in a lifetime experience. Tibet is also the best place for stargazing as it's much closer to the heavens than any other places on earth. It has some of the highest lakes in the world that are rich with fish and other marine life and the surrounding countryside is inhabited by flocks of yellow ducks as well as wild horses and donkeys. The lakes there such as Lake Paiku which is four thousand five hundred ninety two metres above sea level, reflect the beauty of the stars, giving a double view of the sky at night. You can even set up camp there to get the best view of the stars and the Milky Way galaxy.
